explains: adj. 连续的，依次的；接替的，继承的
wordGroup: successive approximation 连续的近似值；连续的学习步骤；逐次近似计算法

sentences.en: This was their fourth successive win.
sentences.cn: 这是他们连续第四次获胜。

sentences.en: Jackson was the winner for a second successive year.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊是连续第二年的获胜者。

sentences.en: Successive governments have tried to tackle the problem.
sentences.cn: 历届政府都试图解决这个问题。
